#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(){

	int t;
	int a1,a2,a3,a4,b1,b2,b3,b4;
	int c1,c2,c3,c4;
	int intr;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>a1>>a2>>a3>>a4;
		cin>>b1>>b2>>b3>>b4;
		c1=max(a1,b1);
		c2=max(a2,b2);
		c3=min(a3,b3);
		c4=min(a4,b4);
		if(c1<c3&&c2<c4)
			intr=(c4-c2)*(c3-c1);
		else
			intr=0;

		cout<<(a4-a2)*(a3-a1)+(b4-b2)*(b3-b1)-intr<<"\n";
	}

}
